Keywords: Central City , Future , Justice League , Justice Society , Past , Police , Scientist , Speedster , Teen Titans , Young Justice
Real Name: Barry Allen
Special Powers
TEAM FLASH: During force construction, you may only include up to three WW80 #053 The Flash on your starting force. Each WW80 #053 The Flash added after the first only costs 20 points to add. At the beginning of the game, you must choose a distinct starting line for each WW80 #053 The Flash on your starting force and they all have a 30 point value for all effects this game (including scoring).
SPEED YOU IN AND OUT OF DANGER: Telekinesis. When The Flash uses it to place a friendly character, after resolutions you may place that character within 2 squares and line of fire of their current square.
